name: Army Men III
short_description: Army Men III, unlike its previous isometric predecessors, is the 2nd direct sequel to the original Army Men series taken to a 3rd person shoulder perspective. While Sarge returns to the series as a companion ally, instead you are now taking the role of Corporal Wallace Aron Niles of Foxtrot Squad. Given an arsenal of over 9 weapons, over 5 vehicles, the ability to melee attack your foes, and command Green soldiers at your disposal, you are the Plastic World's last hope to defeating the Grey Doctor once and for all.
summary: Unofficial successor to The 3DO Company's Army Men II game.
